# makefolio

A modern, fast static site generator specialized for professional portfolio websites.

## Features

- ğŸš€ Fast static site generation
- ğŸ“ Markdown with frontmatter support
- ğŸ¨ Extensible theme system
- ğŸ”§ Simple CLI interface
- ğŸŒ Built-in development server

## Installation

```bash
pip install makefolio
```

## Quick Start

```bash
# Initialize a new portfolio site
makefolio init my-portfolio

# Create a new project page
makefolio new project

# Build the site
makefolio build

# Serve locally with hot reload
makefolio serve
```
